definition: to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)
struggle, criticize, and transform (Cultural Revolution catchcry)

sentences.english: He al ays makes full preparations for his classes and corrects our home ork carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他总是认真备课，认真批改作业。

sentences.english: I spend at least six hours a week marking.
sentences.chinese: 我每周至少要花六个小时批改作业。

sentences.english: He always makes full preparations for his classes and corrects our homework carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他总是认真备课，认真批改作业。

sentences.english: Homework submitted after that will not be graded but will be kept for reference.
sentences.chinese: 迟于第二天交的作业将不被批改，但是留作参考。

sentences.english: I spent at least six hours a week marking.
sentences.chinese: 我每周至少要花六个小时批改作业。

sentences.english: He settled down to correcting the exercises.
So I directed the students to correct their test papers again this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 因此今天下午，我指导着学生们重新批改了试卷。

sentences.english: After class she corrects their home work. She leaves school at six.
sentences.chinese: 课后她批改作业，六点钟离校。

sentences.english: He often makes full preparations for his class and corrects our home ork carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他经常认真备课，认真为我们批改作业。

sentences.english: The teacher spent much time correcting our compositions.
sentences.chinese: 老师花费许多时间批改我们的作文。

sentences.english: He gave us our exercise books after he had corrected them.
sentences.chinese: 他在批改完作业之后就把作业本发给我们了。

sentences.english: The teacher gave us the exercise books after he had corrected them.
sentences.chinese: 老师在批改我们的作业本以后，把它们发给我们。

sentences.english: Concomitantly, I am working as TA, marking papers and running tutorials.
sentences.chinese: 同时，我还兼做助教，批改作业，开设辅导课。

sentences.english: The teacher said to me that, "You go back, and …"
sentences.chinese: 老师对我说，我回去吧，他还要批改作业。

sentences.english: LL: How about after you grade your papers?
sentences.chinese: 批改卷子后，我还要写论文。

sentences.english: I stay up every night to check the homework.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚都熬夜批改作业。

definition: lesson plan/teaching plan/a "missionary case" (a dispute over Christian missionaries during the late Qing)
to correct student papers/to grade exam papers
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
to give guidance/to mentor/to counsel/to coach/to tutor
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
